sentences.sContent: I gestured toward the boathouse, and he looked inside.
sentences.sCn: 我朝停船小屋打手势，他在里面看了看。

phrases.pCn: 做手势，表示；做一个手势

words.tran: 用姿势示意；（讲话时）做手势
用手势谈话；做姿势表达

trans.tranCn: 做手势； 用动作示意
trans.tranOther: to move your hand, arm, or head to tell someone something, or show them what you mean

trans.tranCn: 姿势， 姿态； 手势
trans.tranOther: a movement of part of your body, especially your hands or head, to show what you mean or how you feel
